cartoons.image_alt: Two cows are looking at an inverted U.S.D.A. food pyramid as redesigned by Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
cartoons.caption: "This doesn’t look good."
cartoons.author: Lynn Hsu
cartoons.title: Daily Cartoon: Thursday, January 8th

humor_links.title: I am a Tinder guy holding a fish and I will provide for you.
I thought I would accomplish a lot more today and also by the time I was thirty-five.
Circumstances in which I will not pet your dog.
Fake pandemic introvert vs. real introvert.
Things you could have done instead of checking your phone.

cartoons.image_alt: A woman lounges on an easy chair talking on the phone.
cartoons.caption: "O.K., I’ll put that on my calendar and we’ll just keep an eye on the weather and the fall of democracy."
cartoons.author: Teresa Burns Parkhurst

cartoons.image_alt: An elderly man speaks to a young boy.
cartoons.caption: "In my day, we had to use the C.I.A. to secretly finance military coups if we wanted to steal a country’s resources."
cartoons.author: Ivan Ehlers
cartoons.title: Daily Cartoon: Monday, January 5th

humor_links.title: Starter packs for things you will start but never finish.
I’m the woman who ruined the workplace.
My cat is Gen Z.
I, a performatively feminist male, will be touring internationally.
Automatic-reply text messages.
Lesser-known celebrity-owned alcohol brands.

cartoons.image_alt: Waldo  is sitting at a bar and speaking to another man.
cartoons.caption: "This might just be the beer, but I think I have reason to believe we’re already living in an Orwellian surveillance state."
cartoons.author: Sophie Lucido Johnson and Sammi Skolmoski
